biotools.summary: Tool that uses state-of-the-art nearest neighbour DNA binding thermodynamics to estimate possible unwanted pairings between PCR samples and calculates automatically optimal multiplexing (grouping) solution.

bioschemas.name: MultiPLX
bioschemas.summary: Tool that uses state-of-the-art nearest neighbour DNA binding thermodynamics to estimate possible unwanted pairings between PCR samples and calculates automatically optimal multiplexing (grouping) solution.
